info.name: admin_postman_api
info.description:
Admin Portal API collection for Tag & Seal backend, using role="systemUser". Targets /api/v1/admin/... endpoints.

⚠️ IMPORTANT EXECUTION ORDER:
1. Login first to get authentication token
2. Create reference data in this order:
   - Countries → Regions → Districts → Wards → Villages/Streets/Divisions
   - Livestock Types → Species → Breeds
   - Identity Card Types, School Levels, Legal Statuses
   - Medicine Types → Medicines
   - Other reference data (Birth Types, Birth Problems, etc.)
3. Create entities (Farmers, Extension Officers, Vets, Farms)
4. Create livestock and logs

⚠️ UPDATE TEST DATA:
Replace placeholder IDs ({{countryId}}, {{regionId}}, etc.) with actual IDs from your database after creating the parent records. Validation will fail if you use non-existent IDs.

item.name: Get Extension Officer Farm Invite Details
